name: Contract.friendly.content[x]
title: Contract.friendly.content[x]
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Easily comprehended representation of this Contract
element.definition: Human readable rendering of this Contract in a format and representation intended to enhance comprehension and ensure understandability.

mapping.map: Act.text Definition: A renderable textual or multimedia description (or reference to a description) of the complete information which would reasonably be expected to be displayed to a human reader conveyed by the Act.
